cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of document image binarization, which is a subfield of computer vision (cs.CV). The approach presented in the paper involves using machine learning techniques to learn a decision function for binarization, which falls under the category of supervised learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the use of various features for binarization, which involves image processing techniques (cs.IR). Finally, the paper mentions the use of a small subset of training data to achieve good performance, which is a topic in the field of data science (cs.DS).
